text: USAM Nîmes is a French handball team based in Nîmes, that plays in the LNH Division 1. ==Results== *LNH Division 1: **Winners: (4) 1988, 1990, 1991, 1993 **Runner-Up: (4) 1986, 1987, 1989, 1994 *Coupe de France: **Winners: 1985, 1986, 1994 **Finalists: 1989, 2018 *EHF Champions League: **Semiinalists: 1994 == Team == === Current squad === :Squad for the 2020–21 season ;Goalkeepers *55 Téodor Paul *92 Rémi Desbonnet ;Wingers ;RW: * 15 Romain Tesio * 91 Mohammad Sanad ;LW: *6 Julien Rebichon (c) * 18 Michaël Guigou ;Line players *2 Tom Poyet *4 Benjamin Gallego *7 Rémi Salou * 28 Nicolas Nieto ;Back players ;LB: * 11 Quentin Dupuy * 27 Jean-Jacques Acquevillo * 38 Quentin Minel ;CB: *8 O'Brian Nyateu * 44 Ahmed Hesham ;RB: * 23 Vid Kavtičnik * 24 Luc Tobie ==External links== * Official website USAM Nîmes Category:Sport in Nîmes Category:1960 establishments in France Category:Handball clubs established in 1960
title: USAM Nîmes Gard
